attributes.additional_details:
EHLERS-DANLOS SYNDROME(EDS) is a Genetic connective Tissue Disorder believed to effect 1 in 5,000 Characterised by skin Extensibility, Joint Hypermobility, Tissue Fragility,But it can cause many problems throughout the body even to internal Organs and Autonomic Nervous sytems.This is what needs to be understood
A very Debilitating and Disabling Syndrome for many often misunderstood, misdiagnosed.. PLEASE HELP MAKE A INVISABLE ILLNESS, VISABLE
